messages.subject: Re:OT: Signature
messages.msgSnippet: If I emal through my email account my signiture comes up automatically by going to set up, but if i respond or email through the yahoo group I have to type it
messages.messageBody:
If I emal through my email account my signiture comes up automatically by going to set up, but if i respond or email through the yahoo group I have to type it in.
When you get the digestÂ  in your inbox at the bottom of each post it says reply to sender, group, or via web...i press reply to group from my email account then my signiture will come. I don't know how to make it come up unless i write when actually posting.
hope that helps, natalie

messages.msgSnippet: I see you have gmail. You go into your settings and scroll down until you see the signature place. Have fun! Faith On Sat, Jul 19, 2008 at 8:46 AM,
messages.messageBody:
I see you have gmail. You go into your settings and scroll down until you
see the signature place.
Have fun!
Faith

messages.subject: OT: Signature
messages.msgSnippet: I notice that many of you have these really nice signatures with your blog links or children s names/ages.  Do you type that in each time? Or is there a way to
messages.messageBody:
I notice that many of you have these really nice signatures with your
blog links or children's names/ages. Do you type that in each time?
Or is there a way to create a signature?

Thanks.

-Heather
